alert.note: Alert for Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 19 at 8:16PM MST until February 20 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West wind gusts 50 to 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills, and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Harlowton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will also cause patchy blowing snow, which will reduce visibility in places and cause local drifting on roads.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
